holidays.title: National Pack Your Lunch Day
holidays.description: Remember the good ol’ days when your mom used to pack you lunch in elementary school?

holidays.title: Canberra Day
holidays.description: On Canberra Day, let’s celebrate its rich history and its numerous contributions to Australia.

holidays.title: Commonwealth Day Canada
holidays.description: God Save the Queen and her Commonwealth! Celebrate the glorious history of the British Empire.

holidays.title: Eight Hours Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the victory of the workers of Australia and an eight-hour workday with us.

holidays.title: Festival Of Life In Cracks Day
holidays.description: Beauty can be found everywhere, even between the cracks in the sidewalk.

holidays.title: Fill Our Staplers Day
holidays.description: Without further ado, let’s find out more about how we can observe this holiday.

holidays.title: Harriet Tubman Day
holidays.description: Let us pay tribute to Harriet Tubman's bravery by fighting racial injustice!

holidays.title: International Bagpipe Day
holidays.description: Prepare your kilts as we celebrate one of the world’s most exceptional woodwind instruments!

holidays.title: International Day of Awesomeness
holidays.description: Do you have what it takes to be awesome? Today’s your day to shine!

holidays.title: International Day of Women Judges
holidays.description: It is a great day to pay tribute to these amazing legal minds.

holidays.title: International Wig Day
holidays.description: Show your appreciation for this cool accessory by donning your funkiest wig.

holidays.title: Mario Day
holidays.description: Mario Day, or Mar10 Day, celebrates the Super Mario Bros franchise, for gamers and fans, worldwide.

holidays.title: National Blueberry Popover Day
holidays.description: Prepare your taste buds for one of the world's most delectable delicacies!

holidays.title: National Dry Shampoo Day
holidays.description: Celebrating the beauty secrets of the “money rich, time poor” generation, one spray at a time.

holidays.title: National Heroes and Benefactors Day
holidays.description: Let us honor those who have generously contributed their service and support to Belize.

holidays.title: National Landline Telephone Day
holidays.description: Remember when phones were left at home because they were attached to the house?

holidays.title: National Peel Day
holidays.description: It’s time to get our skin youthful and radiant this  National Peel Day!

holidays.title: National Sending Day
holidays.description: Today is the perfect day to give your business relationships the attention they deserve.

holidays.title: National Skirt Day
holidays.description: Unleash your inner fashionista and put on your best skirt this National Skirt Day.

holidays.title: National Women and Girls HIV/AIDS Awareness Day
holidays.description: Join us in spreading the word and creating awareness about this deadly immunodeficiency virus

holidays.title: Paper Money Day
holidays.description: You don't have to carry jingling coins in your pocket because of paper money!

holidays.title: Salvation Army Day
holidays.description: Inclusivity will never go out of style, which is precisely what the Salvation Army does best.

holidays.title: Taranaki Anniversary
holidays.description: Prepare for some history, today we are going to learn about Taranaki and its conflicts.

holidays.title: Tibetan Uprising Day
holidays.description: Prepare your hearts as we commemorate a day propelling for freedom and justice.

holidays.title: Adelaide Cup Day
holidays.description: Get ready for the fastest horses and jockeys this March Public Holiday!

holidays.title: Commonwealth Day
holidays.description: The historic event is a public holiday in some of its states and honors history.

holidays.title: Histotechnology Professionals Day
holidays.description: We show you how to boost the role of these dedicated healthcare professionals.

holidays.title: Bad Bunny’s Birthday
holidays.description: This intriguing and talented Grammy Award-winning artist has us anticipating his next move.

holidays.title: Carrie Underwood’s Birthday
holidays.description: Globally loved country singer, wife, and mom of two – is there anything Carrie Underwood cannot do?

holidays.title: Chad Wild Clay’s Birthday
holidays.description: Come along as we get to know this YouTube superstar and all his quirks.

holidays.title: Chuck Norris’s Birthday
holidays.description: It’s time to celebrate the man Chuck Norris and his talent, skills, and legacy.

holidays.title: Def Noodles’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's get to know the guy behind the celeb gossip news show "Def Noodles."

holidays.title: Keke Wyatt’s Birthday
holidays.description: Keke Wyatt is a gifted singer, songwriter, loving mother, and a wonderful woman.

holidays.title: Sharon Stone’s Birthday
holidays.description: Stone rose to prominence as one of the biggest sex symbols of the 1990s.
